item.title: Petco 上调全年 Adj.
item.description: Petco Health & Wellness Co.上调全年盈利指导后股价攀升，表明其扭亏为盈取得了进展。【原文：Petco Health & Wellness Co. climbed after raising its full-year earnings guidance, signaling progress in its turnaround.】

item.title: 交易员追捧美联储期货，目标是 12 月降息
item.description: 投资者大举押注美联储将在下月召开的决策者会议上再次降息，从而消除了上周还在怀疑美联储会降息的疑虑，为美国债券的上涨奠定了基础。【原文：Investors are betting big that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates again when policymakers meet next month, erasing doubts that had tipped the odds against a move as recently as last week and setting the stage for gains in US bonds.】

item.title: Homeplus 出事后，韩国 PE 行业提议自律
item.description: 在亿万富翁迈克尔-金（Michael Kim）的 MBK Partners 主导的对 Homeplus Co.【原文：South Korea’s private equity fund industry promised new “self-regulation” after a string of controversies including the abortive Homeplus Co. buyout led by billionaire Michael Kim’s MBK Partners shook public confidence and triggered calls for tighter oversight.】

item.title: 惠普宣布裁员，因盈利前景低于预期
item.description: 惠普公司给出的本年度利润展望低于预期，该公司表示将通过使用更多的人工智能工具，在2028财年之前裁员4000至6000人。【原文：HP Inc. gave a profit outlook for current year that fell short of estimates and the company said it will cut 4,000 to 6,000 employees through fiscal 2028 by using more AI tools.】

item.title: 戴尔上调人工智能服务器年度出货量预期
item.description: 戴尔科技公司（Dell Technologies Inc.）上调了对关键人工智能服务器市场的年度预测，这表明当前数据中心繁荣所需的机器类型需求持续增长。【原文：Dell Technologies Inc. raised its annual projections for the key artificial intelligence server market, a sign of sustained demand for the type of machines needed in the current data center boom.】

item.title: 前日本央行官员称日元疲软提升 12 月加息可能性
item.description: 据日本央行前执行董事称，近期日元走软增加了日本央行下月上调基准利率的可能性。【原文：The recent weakening of the yen is increasing the likelihood of the Bank of Japan raising its benchmark rate next month, according to a former executive director of the central bank.】

item.title: 阿克曼的潘兴封闭式基金目标首次公开募股 50 亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，亿万富翁对冲基金经理比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）计划为其在美国上市的封闭式基金募集 50 亿美元，其中 20 亿美元来自知名机构投资者。【原文：Billionaire hedge fund manager Bill Ackman aims to raise $5 billion for his US-listed closed-end fund, including $2 billion from well-known institutional investors anchoring the deal, according to people with knowledge of the offering.】

item.title: 华尔街公司 Fortress 和 Ares 在便携式厕所交易中面临全面亏损
item.description: 在 Platinum Equity 公司策划的一笔便携式厕所公司交易中，华尔街三家重量级公司将蒙受全盘亏损，这凸显了在整个私募股权投资领域备受争议的策略的危险性。【原文：Three Wall Street heavyweights are poised to suffer a total loss on a deal for a portable-toilet company orchestrated by Platinum Equity, spotlighting the hazards of a controversial strategy that’s gained traction across private equity.】

item.title: 礼来捐赠基金因股价大涨而率先突破 1000 亿美元大关
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.）的股价近日创下新高，成为首家估值达到 1 万亿美元的制药公司。股价的飙升也使创始人家族的私人基金会资产达到创纪录的 1000 亿美元。【原文：Eli Lilly & Co.’s stock has reached new highs in recent days, becoming the first pharmaceutical company to hit a $1 trillion valuation. The surge has also lifted the founding family’s private foundation to a record $100 billion in assets.】

item.title: 法官裁定卡尔希受内华达州博彩业法规管辖
item.description: 拉斯维加斯的一名联邦法官允许州博彩监管机构对这家预测市场初创公司采取执法行动，从而打击了 Kalshi 公司在内华达州的体育博彩业务。【原文：A federal judge in Las Vegas dealt a blow to Kalshi Inc.’s sports-betting business in Nevada by allowing state gaming regulators to take enforcement actions against the predictions-market startup.】

item.title: 美国以 2,840 亿美元赤字开启新财年
item.description: 上个月，美国以 2,840 亿美元的预算赤字拉开了 2026 财年的序幕，这凸显了特朗普政府试图在未来几年大幅缩减联邦借贷需求所面临的挑战。【原文：The US kicked off the 2026 fiscal year with a $284 billion budget deficit last month, underscoring the Trump administration’s challenge in attempting to dramatically shrink federal borrowing needs in coming years.】

item.title: 华纳音乐与人工智能音乐初创公司 Suno 达成和解
item.description: 华纳音乐集团公司与生成式人工智能音乐初创公司 Suno 就版权诉讼达成和解，并同意在音乐创作方面建立新的合作伙伴关系。【原文：Warner Music Group Corp. and Suno, a generative-artificial intelligence music startup, settled their copyright lawsuit and agreed on a new partnership for creating music.】

item.title: 尽管中期动荡，阿根廷经济仍好于预期
item.description: 尽管地方和全国中期选举导致市场动荡加剧，但阿根廷 9 月份的经济增长仍超过预期。【原文：Argentina’s economy expanded more than expected in September despite heightened market turmoil brought on by local and national midterm elections.】

item.title: 美国在委内瑞拉的恐怖标签加深了石油公司的风险
item.description: 专家说，特朗普政府最近试图孤立尼古拉斯-马杜罗政府，这使外国石油公司在委内瑞拉的日常运营更加复杂。【原文：The Trump administration’s latest attempt to isolate Nicolás Maduro’s government further complicates day-to-day operations for foreign oil companies in Venezuela, experts say.】

item.title: 埃利奥特关联公司收购 Citgo 的申请获特拉华州法官批准
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）的一家附属公司在法院下令进行的拍卖中胜出，赢得了委内瑞拉最有价值的外国资产--美国炼油商 Citgo 石油公司--的控制权。【原文：An affiliate of Elliott Investment Management won a acourt-ordered auction for control of Venezuela’s most-valuable foreign asset, US oil refiner Citgo Petroleum Corp.】

item.title: 美国银行警告：赌博和预测市场带来新的信贷风险
item.description: 美国银行对预测市场和体育赌博的爆炸式增长敲响了警钟，警告称这可能导致消费者背负过多债务并拖欠贷款。【原文：Bank of America is sounding the alarm over the explosive growth of prediction markets and sports gambling, warning it could lead consumers to take on too much debt and default on loans.】

item.title: 人工智能公司指控 SAP 窃取供应链商业机密
item.description: 供应链人工智能公司 o9 Solutions Inc. 起诉 SAP SE，称其三名前高管窃取了这家欧洲软件巨头的商业机密。【原文：SAP SE was sued by supply-chain artificial intelligence firm o9 Solutions Inc., which claimed three of its former executives stole trade secrets for the European software giant.】

item.title: 银行计划为希悦尔 LBO 一揽子债务提供 45 亿美元贷款
item.description: Clayton Dubilier & Rice 预计将出售约 45 亿美元的杠杆贷款，以帮助其为收购包装公司希悦尔提供资金，这是数月来银行承销的最大收购融资之一。【原文：Clayton Dubilier & Rice is expected to sell about $4.5 billion of leveraged loans to help fund its acquisition of packaging firm Sealed Air as part of one of the biggest buyout financings underwritten by banks in months.】

item.title: 石油交易商关注供应过剩，但仍对过去的价格飙升耿耿于怀
item.description: 因过去地缘政治价格飙升而伤痕累累的看跌石油交易商越来越倾向于以更安全的方式来应对即将到来的供应过剩。【原文：Bearish oil traders scarred by past geopolitical price spikes are increasingly favoring safer ways to position for a looming glut.】

item.title: 加密货币暴跌拖累美国 IPO 候选者推后上市时间
item.description: 本季度美国新股上市的回报率大幅下降，加密货币暴跌使该行业近期的首次公开募股成为最大的牺牲品之一，这为Grayscale Investments Inc.和BitGo Holdings Inc.等公司在不久的将来上市设立了更高的门槛。【原文：Returns from new US listings have waned considerably this quarter and the crypto crash has made recent IPOs in the sector among the biggest casualties, creating a higher bar for companies such as Grayscale Investments Inc. and BitGo Holdings Inc. to go public in the near future.】

item.title: 安哥拉称已与摩根大通达成10亿美元贷款展期协议
item.description: 安哥拉财政部称，安哥拉已与摩根大通公司达成协议，将一笔于今年年底到期的10亿美元贷款展期。【原文：Angola has agreed with JPMorgan Chase & Co. to rollover a $1 billion loan that was due at the end of this year, according to the country’s finance ministry.】

item.title: 杰富瑞牵头的 11 亿美元贷款销售为 Air Methods 所撤消
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Air Methods 公司取消了计划中的 11 亿美元杠杆贷款出售计划。【原文：Air Methods Corp. scrapped a planned $1.1 billion leveraged loan sale, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 里夫斯将最低工资上调 4.1% 使英国通胀目标面临风险
item.description: 英国将把 21 岁及以上工人的最低工资提高 4.1%，以帮助低收入者。【原文：Britain will increase the minimum wage for workers aged 21 and over by 4.1%, in a bid to help low-earners that experts have warned would harm small businesses and stoke inflation.】

item.title: 前商品交易员因隐瞒亏损被判入狱三年
item.description: 休斯顿的一名前商品交易员在承认向雇主隐瞒了数亿美元的损失以获得高额奖金后，被判入狱三年。【原文：A fomer commodities trader in Houston was ordered to spend three years behind bars after admitting to hiding hundreds of millions of dollars in losses from his employer to secure a hefty bonus.】

item.title: 南非考虑对在线赌博征收 20% 的税以遏制风险
item.description: 南非正在考虑对网络赌博征收 20% 的税，以遏制其快速增长并解决相关的社会危害问题。【原文：South Africa is considering imposing a 20% tax on online gambling to curb its rapid growth and address related social harms.】

item.title: 美国推动乌克兰和平协议，大宗商品看点何在？
item.description: 为结束乌克兰战争所做的新努力让人们重新审视，这场持续近四年的冲突将如何影响多种原材料的流通。【原文：Fresh efforts to end the war in Ukraine are putting renewed scrutiny on what will happen to the flow of multiple raw materials that have been upended by the near-four-year conflict.】

item.title: 赛诺菲在法国对法国兴业银行融资交易的税务欺诈调查中遭到突袭
item.description: 法国当局周二突袭了赛诺菲公司（Sanofi SA）的巴黎总部，这是对法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）提供的一笔融资交易进行税务欺诈调查的一部分。【原文：Sanofi SA’s Paris headquarters were raided Tuesday by French authorities as part of a tax fraud investigation into a financing deal provided by Societe Generale SA.】

item.title: 苹果将超越三星成为世界顶级手机制造商
item.description: 据 Counterpoint Research 公司称，苹果公司将在十多年来首次重新夺回全球最大智能手机制造商的宝座，这主要得益于新款 iPhone 系列的成功亮相和消费者升级设备的热潮。【原文：Apple Inc. will retake its crown as the world’s largest smartphone maker for the first time in more than a decade, lifted by the successful debut of a new iPhone series and a rush of consumers upgrading devices, according to Counterpoint Research.】

item.title: 更多加拿大贸易数据推迟发布，美国停摆加剧积压
item.description: 由于美国政府关门，加拿大统计局再次推迟发布国际商品贸易数据。【原文：Statistics Canada has delayed another release of international merchandise trade data due to the US government shutdown.】

item.title: Stellantis 在意大利文艺复兴时期将产量转向菲亚特 500 混合动力车
item.description: Stellantis NV 公司明年将在其意大利米拉菲奥里（Mirafiori）工厂生产约 10 万辆混合动力菲亚特 500 汽车，为菲亚特斯帕公司的历史中心提供了一条生命线，因为该公司兑现了在意大利提高产量的承诺。【原文：Stellantis NV will produce some 100,000 hybrid Fiat 500s at its Mirafiori plant in Italy next year, giving a lifeline to the historic center of Fiat Spa, as the manufacturer makes good on a pledge to bolster output in Italy.】
